mapper.update:
update wvg_user x
wvg_login_name = #{wvg_login_name},
wvg_real_name = #{wvg_real_name},
wvg_id_type = #{wvg_id_type},
wvg_spec_id = #{wvg_spec_id},
wvg_id_number = #{wvg_id_number},
wvg_user_iphone = #{wvg_user_iphone},
wvg_account_data = #{wvg_account_data},
wvg_account_enabled = #{wvg_account_enabled},
wvg_user_password = #{wvg_user_password},
wvg_password_data = #{wvg_password_data},
wvg_add_time = #{wvg_add_time},
wvg_update_time = #{wvg_update_time},
wvg_account_type = #{wvg_account_type},
wvg_login_time = #{wvg_login_time},
wvg_login_ip = #{wvg_login_ip},
wvg_account_remarks = #{wvg_account_remarks},
where x.wvg_user_id = #{wvg_user_id}
